document.text:
From: BOBBI C STERNHEIM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: URGENT-Ghislaine Maxwell 02879-509 - COURT ORDER 
Date: Fri, 15 Jan 2021 23:33:32 +0000 
Much appreciated. 
Best-
Bobbi 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
that may be confidential and/or privileged.

delete this message. Thank you. 
On 
Jan 15, 2021, at 6:10 PM, 
Hi Bobbi, 
wrote: 
Thank you for letting me know. I've reached out to MDC legal counsel to for confirmation that the MDC will comply with 
Judge Nathan's order. I also separately sent a copy of the order to MDC legal counsel earlier today, so they should be 
fully aware of their obligations under it. 
Have a good weekend. 
Best, 
EFTA00021732

From: BOBBI C STERNHEIM 
Sent: Friday, January 15, 2021 5:58 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Fwd: URGENT-Ghislaine Maxwell 02879-509 - COURT ORDER 
Good 
evening, 
In disregard of the Court's order, the team leader of Ms. Maxwell's security detail 
informed Ms. Maxwell that she will not have access to the laptop on Saturday. 
(See email below.) 
I will be notifying Judge Nathan of MDC's blatant clistard of the Court's order. 
Perhaps this will move the Court to direct Warden to appear and face questions 
concerning the mistreatment of Ms. Maxwell and misconduct by his staff. 
Any assistance you can provide to effect compliance with the order so that Ms. Maxwell 
has access to the laptop over this long holiday weekend is greatly appreciated. 
Thank you. Enjoy the long weekend. 
Bobbi 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
**Covid-19 Notice: The West 19th Street office is currently closed but we continue to work remotely. 
Please use entail or fax, instead of regular mail, for all correspondence during this time. 
We continue to work regular business hours throughout this situation. 
Thank you for your consideration. Our best wishes for your good health and well being. 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Stemheim 
that may be confidential and/or privileged. 
If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. 
If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and 
then delete this message. Thank you. 
Begin fonvarded message: 
EFTA00021733

From: BOBBI C STERNHEIM <bcstemheim@mac.com>
Subject: URGENT-Ghislaine Maxwell 02879-509 - COURT ORDER 
Date: January 15, 2021 at 5:41:09 PM EST 
To: BRO/Exec Assistant—
Earlier today I  forwarded a copy of the court order directing MDC to 
provide Ms. Maxwell with access to her laptop on weekends and holidays. 
(See email and Order below). 
At 3:40 pm, 
Office 
old Ms. Maxwell 
she twill not be  getting t lapto' on aturda. 
Ms. Maxwell informed Officer that access to the laptop has been court ordered, 
to which Officer Regan replied  on 't care. 
Be advised: Judge Nathan will be informed of the explicit violation of the Court's order. 
I  urge the MDC to immediately comply with the order or face contempt of court. 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim

Begin forwarded message: 
From: BOBBI C STERNHEIM 
Date: January 15, 2021 at 3:05: 
To: BRO-ExecAssistant-S BRO-ExecAssistant-S 
Subject: URGENT-Ghislaine Maxwell 02879-509 COURT ORDER 
By Order of the Court (attached) 
EFTA00021734

You are directed to give Ms.Maxwell access to her laptop on weekends and holidays. Please comply 
immediately. 
Thank you-
Bobbi 
C. Stemheim, Esq. 
Docket Text: 
MEMO ENDORSEMENT as to Ghislaine Maxwell on [115] LETTER by Ghislaine Maxwell 
addressed to Judge Alison J. Nathan from Christian R. Everdell dated January 14, 2021 re: 
Laptop Access. ENDORSEMENT: The unobjected-to request is GRANTED. The Bureau of 
Prisons is ORDERED to give the Defendant access to the laptop computer on weekends 
and holidays during the hours that she is permitted to review discovery. SO ORDERED. 
(Signed by Judge Alison J. Nathan on 1/15/2021) (InI) 
https://ectinysd.uscourts.gov/doc1/127128346956? 
caseid=539612&de_seq_num=371&magic_num=56905676 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
bcsternheim@mac.com
